it.polimi.ingsw.controller

Class Controller

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.ingsw.controller.Controller
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.util.Observer

    public class Controller
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.util.Observer
    Controller class: is the interface between the virtual view and the controller's class that manage the game logic Receive the updates from the virtual view perform the correlated methods and send to the virtual view the request message for the clients

    • Method Detail

      • update

        public void update(java.util.Observable virtualView,
                   java.lang.Object message)
        Receive the notify from the virtual view and perform the message's actions
        Specified by:
        update in interface java.util.Observer
        Parameters:
        virtualView - is the class which notify the messages
        message - is the event notified

      • createGameManager

        public void createGameManager(int mapChoice)
        Method called at the instantiation of the controller to create the game's GameManager. It create the game map, according with the following codification: 0: small map 1: big left, small right 2: small left, big right 3: big map
        Parameters:
        mapChoice - is the codification of the map chosen for the game

      • getUsersVirtualView

        public java.util.Map<java.lang.String,VirtualView> getUsersVirtualView()
        Getter method
        Returns:
        the mapping between the players username and their virtual view

      • getGameManager

        public GameManager getGameManager()
        Getter method
        Returns:
        the game manager
